name: The 4th Pillar Token from Ethereum
description: Bridged from Ethereum via https://bridge.pulsechain.com. Original Address - 0x4730fB1463A6F1F44AEB45F6c5c422427f37F4D0. FOUR token is a technical and incentive component dedicated to; (1) RTA (i.e. right-to-access), and; (2) MTO (i.e. multiple-transfer option) models in the ecosystem of Web3 communication.
